text: Antons Justs (22 November 1931-17 February 2019) was a Latvian Roman Catholic bishop. Justs was ordained to the priesthood in 1960. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Jelgava, Latvia, from 1996 to 2011.Diocese of Jelgava Justs died on 17 February 2019 at the age of 87.Mūžībā aizgājis Jelgavas bīskaps Antons Justs ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Roman Catholic bishops Category:Latvian people
title: Antons Justs
